about_the_game:
Take care of your tail and defeat hordes of enemies!

Ludovishchi Survivors - is a casual indie survival game with elements of a simplified roguelike. Where you have to fight mutants who have captured the earth after a mysterious incident.

Ludovishchi Survivors - is a game in which you will have the opportunity to choose one of several characters, a new race of humans. Each character has its own characteristics and unique skills.

Battles with mutants

While surviving for a while, you will be attacked by many different mutants. The number of which grows with each second. Your task is to defeat them and survive.

Use unique skills

In the destruction of mutant monsters, you will be helped by unique skills that release a hail of bullets. Each skill has a system of pumping and combinations. And you will also be supported by blessings that you can pump for solar coins earned in battle. Combine the skills of cold weapons with the power of lioffso, which grants the character an aura of elemental elements, to unlock unique abilities.

Developers

The game developers are developed by one person, with the exception of help from friends in writing music, translating and drawing part of the environment. This is his first game, please love and favor. The developer is self-taught, drew the environment, monsters, according to lessons on video hostings, and also programmed the gameplay.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This is a pixel, casual game with elements of a simplified roguelike, in the genre of survival in hordes, for which you need to use bullet hell. Defeat hordes of mutant monsters. Earn solar coins for which you will pump the blessings of the Ludovischi. To defeat everyone who will stand in your way.
